dateErrors.pastDate: You cannot select a date in the past.
dateErrors.bookedDates: You cannot select a range that includes booked dates.

emailBanner.title: Wait a minute...
emailBanner.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter!
emailBanner.description: You will never miss important product updates, latest news and community QA sessions. Our newsletter is once a week, every Sunday.

features.description: We provide you with the easiest and most convenient hotel booking experience. With thousands of quality hotels, competitive prices, and dedicated support.

easyBooking.title: Easy Booking
easyBooking.description: Simple and quick booking process with just a few clicks

securePayment.title: Secure Payment
securePayment.description: Multiple payment methods with guaranteed security

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our support team is always ready to assist you

deals.title: Great Deals
deals.description: Special promotions and exclusive offers available

resetPassword.question: How can I reset my password?
resetPassword.answer: You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot password?' link on the login page. An email will be sent to your registered email address with instructions to reset your password.

multipleAccounts.question: Can I create more than one account?
multipleAccounts.answer: We recommend having only one account per user. Multiple accounts from the same user may lead to confusion and potential issues with bookings and rewards.

newsletter.question: How can I subscribe to monthly newsletter?
newsletter.answer: You can subscribe to our newsletter by providing your email in the subscription form at the bottom of our homepage or through your account settings after logging in.

creditCard.question: Do you store credit card information securely?
creditCard.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your payment information. We comply with PCI DSS standards to ensure your credit card data is stored and processed securely.

notFound.title: Something is not right...
notFound.description: Page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL. If you think this is an error contact support.

openSource.title: Open source
openSource.description: Our code is open source and available on GitHub for anyone to use and contribute

free.title: Free for everyone
free.description: All our basic services are free for both personal and commercial use

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Comprehensive guides and API references to help you get started quickly

security.title: Security
security.description: We take security seriously with regular audits and industry best practices

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed analytics to help you understand your customers and improve your business

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Real-time notifications to keep you updated on important events

getStarted.title: Get started
getStarted.description: Start using our platform today and transform your hotel booking experience
